name: excalidraw-mcp-server
description: MCP server that streams hand-drawn Excalidraw diagrams as SVG with animations
author: Guille Garcia

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app.html vite build && cross-env INPUT=standalone.html vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && esbuild drawing-store-memory.ts --outfile=dist/drawing-store-memory.js --platform=node --format=esm && esbuild drawing-store-kv.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/drawing-store-kv.js --platform=node --format=esm --packages=external && esbuild drawing-store.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/drawing-store.js --platform=node --format=esm --external:./drawing-store-memory.js --external:./drawing-store-kv.js && esbuild server.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/server.js --external:./drawing-store.js --packages=external && esbuild create-http-app.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/create-http-app.js --platform=node --format=esm --external:./server.js --external:./drawing-store.js --packages=external && esbuild main.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.js --external:./server.js --external:./drawing-store.js --packages=external --banner:js="#!/usr/bin/env node"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run watch" "npm run serve"
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run serve
